channel.title: CVE Feed for Electra -- Electra Central AC unit

item.title: CVE-2023-24502|2023-04-17T00:00:00 -- electra -- electra%20central%20ac%20unit
item.description: Electra Central AC unit – The unit opens an AP with an easily calculated password.

item.title: CVE-2023-24501|2023-04-17T00:00:00 -- electra -- electra%20central%20ac%20unit
item.description: Electra Central AC unit – Hardcoded Credentials in unspecified code used by the unit.

item.title: CVE-2023-24500|2023-04-17T00:00:00 -- electra -- electra%20central%20ac%20unit
item.description: Electra Central AC unit – Adjacent attacker may cause the unit to load unauthorized FW.
